snippet.title: Lichtspeer - Launch Trailer (PC/PS4)
snippet.description:
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/434740
PS4 North America: https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-us/games/lichtspeer/cid=UP2764-CUSA06364_00-LICHTSPEERGAME00
PS4 Europe - available on September 29th

Lichtspeer, an action arcade lightspear-throwing simulator based in ancient Germanic future, is coming to PC and PlayStation 4 on September 27th. PS Vita version will follow a month later.

In a land filled with Penguin Vikings, Wurst Zombies, and Hipster Ice Giants, survival is an art. Fortunately, an ancient champion with an elegant weapon has been summoned to please the gods and restore balance to the universe.

Grab your lightspear, become a Germonaut and traverse through lands straight out of Germanic myths. Survive with style and expand your powers to fight for the glory and amusement of the almighty gods.

AIM. SHOOT. KILL. DIE. THE LICHTGODS DEMAND IT. This is LICHTSPEER

Website: http://www.lichtspeer.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Lichtspeer
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/Lichtspeer
